job.title: Data & Applied Scientist
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Are you someone with a passion for data, analytics, insights, and technology? Do you want to work on one of the largest data science teams at Microsoft, lighting up actionable insights that drive key business decisions for the Microsoft Cloud? The goal of the Microsoft Cloud Data Sciences (MCDS) team is to foster a data-driven culture and to encourage & enable the entire organization to make more informed decisions through data. In support of this mission, the MCDS Transformation team works closely with engineering, marketing, finance, sales, and business leaders to identify opportunities for improving the customer experience and accelerating the growth of cloud platforms and services. Our charter spans the breadth of Cloud + AI (Azure, Dynamics, Power Platform, Business Applications) where we surface key insights, identify salient trends, perform analyses of historical data, define benchmarks and models for predicting upcoming performance, and design and deliver standardized views of business performance. The team is passionate about continuous learning: you will join a diverse team focused on developing and applying new skills in an inclusive environment. You can read more about our teamâ€™s work on Medium at (https://medium.com/data-science-at-microsoft).  We are looking for an experienced Data & Applied Scientist to leverage large-scale data and build insights focused on unlocking new value for Microsoft by understanding product consumption and journey patterns across the Microsoft Cloud. This role is primarily focused on partnering with and enabling the Business Applications organization by providing data science insights such as customer segmentation, pairing recommendations, and other insights derived from data. You will be joining a group of experts on the front lines of synthesizing vast data sets of customer journey and product engagement behavior into targeted recommendations for addressing real world cloud computing business challenges at scale.
